post_header.content: Everything You Need for the Perfect Orlando Getaway

html.content:
It’s easy to see why Buena Vista Suites is Orlando’s favorite all-suite retreat. Along with spacious, residential-style suites and an ideal location just 1.5 miles from Walt Disney World®, we invite our guests to start each morning off right with our complimentary full American breakfast buffet in the Valencia Room. Between visits to Orlando’s incredible theme parks and attractions, soak up the Florida sun at our outdoor pool, perfect your backhand with a game of tennis, get your heart pumping in the fitness room, or play a pick-up game on our lighted basketball court. Buena Vista Suites is also proud to be an official Green Lodging hotel, with a variety of eco-friendly practices in place that reduce waste and help protect our natural resources. 

Self-parking is complimentary, and with scheduled shuttles to Disney and some of Orlando’s best outlet shopping – you may not move your car until it’s time to head home. Of course, after all those adventures you’ll need a delicious way to re-charge, and we’ve got you covered with the classic Italian fare at Vista Bistro and delicious grab-and-go options from Bistro Pizza Express. We even offer 24-hour in-suite dining, ensuring a great meal is always available, day or night.

 

Visit Walt Disney World® Resort and More

 

Buena Vista Suites is a Walt Disney World Good Neighbor® Hotel, which means guests can purchase tickets to Disney theme parks directly from the Guest Services Desk in our hotel lobby. We also offer scheduled shuttle service to and from the Walt Disney World® Ticket & Transportation Center and Disney Springs™ as well as the Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets and Lake Buena Vista Factory Stores. Please visit our FAQ page for additional details and shuttle times. For more information about purchasing attractions tickets, please contact us directly at 407-238-7766.

Our friendly team is also happy to help make your Orlando getaway unforgettable with local recommendations and directions, dining reservations and more.

col1_html.content:
• 100% Non-Smoking Suites
  • Complimentary Full American Breakfast Buffet 
  • Complimentary Parking
  • Scheduled Shuttle Service To/From Walt Disney World® Ticket & Transportation Center
  • Scheduled Shuttle Service To/From Orlando Vineland PremiumOutlets and Lake Buena Vista Factory Stores
